article.headline: ETFs with big ON Semiconductor stakes jump on Starboard news
article.body: Exchange-traded funds with heavy exposure to ON Semiconductor Corporation ON, +1.19% jumped Thursday morning as the stock surged on a report that an activist investor had taken a stake. At a virtual conference Thursday, Starboard Value LP CEO Jeff Smith said he thinks the company is undervalued. ON shares rocketed more than 11% higher. The Invesco Dynamic Semiconductors ETF PSI, +2.37% rose 1.3%, while the SPDR S&P Semiconductor ETF XSD, +2.63% gained 1.4%. Both ETFs have about 3% of their portfolios allocated to ON.
